name: NATIONAL AUTOMATIC MERCHANDISING ASSOCIATION (NAMA)
sampleDescriptions: Creating express Congressional consent to allow program participants to utilize SNAP/EBT as a form of payment in convenience service retail marketplaces (e.g., vending and micro markets) via the reaut
